name: Thin Ice Rescue
description:
This was a quick and simple project, just a bit of fun. It's nothing you want to play for hours on end, but it works decently enough as a simple pick-up-and-play game. It really felt liberating working on something that didn't take ages to see through.

Thin Ice Rescue was inspired by IvanBASIC's excellent little Breaking the Ice one-line (!) BASIC game for the ZX Spectrum.
